Articles.Content:
So I got KSP while a go and had a 'blast' with it.

then I found Mechjeb, had even more fun, but got bored.

So I came back, and now have over 400 hours into it.

I know there is something better I could be doing with my life, but I'm not sure what it is right now.

Anyhow, just decided to come onto the boards and great all you awesome folk while I work on a new Career Mode game.

Off to the Mun, hopefully all that I've learned will mean that I don't strand Jeb on the Mun with a broken rocket again.

I did spend the last few days playing around with the Interstellar mod before deciding that repeatedly blowing up 40 ton fission reactors on the launch pad was probably not great for the survival of Kurbal-kind, and the warp drive just took all the fun out of the game. "Where do you want to go today Jeb? Jool? Point at it, and engage...now stop and jump away from it until you've slowed down enough to enter orbit."

So I've picked up the 'near future' pack and gotta say love it...just having problems finding the radiators for the reactors.

Safe flying!

I know there is something better I could be doing with my life

Piffle.

Welcome to the forum.

Thanks.

After 430 hours I have finally managed to land on the Mun without MechJeb's help and without leaving a new crater, or a stranded Kerbin. I'm calling this a win. And very likely leaving MechJeb alone for a while.

http://i.imgur.com/4ZpiKW8.jpg
